snippet.title: LOOKING GLASS【Chapter 1】No Commentary
snippet.description:
Looking Glass is a free RPG horror-esque exploration game by Rae (https://twitter.com/ylceon) made with WOLF RPG Editor and starring characters from the mobile game Ensemble Stars.

It features a 4-chapter story centering Aoi Yuuta, who seemingly experiences reoccurring nightmares taking place in a different world. However, things change starting the appearance of someone with almost the exact same face as him.

You can download the game here: https://ylceon.wixsite.com/looking-glass

This video was recorded and uploaded with the permission of the game creator, and contains spoilers for the game.
